tools.name: mshtools-todo_read
tools.description: Use this tool to read the current to-do list for the session. This tool should be used proactively and frequently to ensure awareness of the current task list status.

tools.name: mshtools-todo_write
tools.description: Use this tool to create and manage a structured task list for your current coding session.

tools.name: mshtools-ipython
tools.description: Execute Python code in an IPython environment with full Jupyter Notebook-style interaction.

code.description: Python code to run in the IPython environment.

restart.description: Whether to restart the IPython environment.

tools.name: mshtools-read_file
tools.description: Reads a file from the local filesystem.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to read (must be absolute, not relative)

limit.description: Number of lines to read (optional; useful for long files)

offset.description: Line number to start reading from (optional; useful for long files) 1-based index

tools.name: mshtools-edit_file
tools.description: Performs exact string replacements in files.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to modify (must be absolute, not relative)

new_string.description: The text to replace it with (must be different from old_string)

replace_all.description: Replace all occurrences of old_string (default: false)

tools.name: mshtools-write_file
tools.description: Writes a file to the local filesystem.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the file to write (must be absolute, not relative)

content.description: The content to write to the file, maxlength is 100000

append.description: Whether to append to the file instead of overwriting it

tools.name: mshtools-shell
tools.description: Execute shell commands in a non-persistent environment with proper security and handling measures.

description.description: Clear, concise summary (5-10 words) of what this command does.

timeout.description: Optional timeout for command execution (in milliseconds, max: 600000)

tools.name: mshtools-browser_click
tools.description: Browser automation tool that clicks interactive elements on web pages.

element_index.description: The zero-based index of the element to click from the page's interactive element list.

citation_id.description: The citation ID of a previously visited webpage.

url.description: The complete URL of the webpage to interact with.

download_screenshot_path.description: The path to download the screenshot.

need_screenshot.description: Whether to include a screenshot in the result.

tools.name: mshtools-browser_find
tools.description: Browser automation tool that searches for and highlights specific text on web pages.

keyword.description: The text or keyword to search for on the page.

citation_id.description: The citation ID of a previously visited webpage.

url.description: The complete URL of the webpage to search.

download_screenshot_path.description: The path to download the screenshot.

need_screenshot.description: Whether to include a screenshot in the result.

skip.description: Skip the first N matches to find subsequent occurrences.

tools.name: mshtools-browser_input
tools.description: Browser automation tool that enters text into form fields and input elements.

element_index.description: The zero-based index of the input element from the page's interactive element list.

content.description: The text content to enter into the specified input field.

citation_id.description: The citation ID of a previously visited webpage.

url.description: The complete URL of the webpage to input text.

download_screenshot_path.description: The path to download the screenshot.

need_screenshot.description: Whether to include a screenshot in the result.

tools.name: mshtools-browser_scroll_down
tools.description: Browser automation tool that scrolls down on web pages to reveal more content.

scroll_amount.description: The number of pixels to scroll down.

citation_id.description: The citation ID of a previously visited webpage.

url.description: The complete URL of the webpage to scroll down.

download_screenshot_path.description: The path to download the screenshot.

need_screenshot.description: Whether to include a screenshot in the result.

tools.name: mshtools-browser_scroll_up
tools.description: Browser automation tool that scrolls up on web pages to access previously hidden content.

scroll_amount.description: The number of pixels to scroll up.

citation_id.description: The citation ID of a previously visited webpage.

url.description: The complete URL of the webpage to scroll up.

download_screenshot_path.description: The path to download the screenshot.

need_screenshot.description: Whether to include a screenshot in the result.

tools.name: mshtools-browser_state
tools.description: Browser automation tool that displays the current browser session state and open tabs.

tools.name: mshtools-browser_visit
tools.description: Browser automation tool that loads and displays web pages.

url.description: The complete URL of the webpage to visit.

citation_id.description: The citation ID of a previously visited webpage.

download_screenshot_path.description: The path to download the screenshot.

need_screenshot.description: Whether to include a screenshot in the result.

tools.name: mshtools-browser_screenshot
tools.description: Browser automation tool that takes a screenshot of a page.

url.description: The complete URL of the webpage to visit.

citation_id.description: The citation ID of a previously visited webpage.

download_screenshot_path.description: The path to download the screenshot.

tools.name: mshtools-screenshot_web_full_page
tools.description: Capture a full webpage screenshot using segmented screenshot stitching.

url.description: The complete URL of the webpage to visit.

citation_id.description: The citation ID of a previously visited webpage.

download_screenshot_path.description: The path to download the screenshot.

tools.name: mshtools-web_search
tools.description: Web Search API, works like Google Search.

queries.description: Search directly by queries. All queries will be searched in parallel.

tools.name: mshtools-search_image_by_text
tools.description: Web Image Search API, works like Google Image Search.

download_dir.description: The directory to save the images.

total_count.description: The number of images to return, default is 10

tools.name: mshtools-search_image_by_image
tools.description: Image Search by Image API, works like Google Lens.

image_url.description: The URL of the image to search based on, or the local absolute file path of the image.

download_dir.description: The directory to save the images.

total_count.description: The number of images to return, default is 10

tools.name: mshtools-generate_image
tools.description: Create an image based on a text description using AI image generation.

description.description: The description of image to be generated.

output_file.description: A png file to save the generated image.

reference_images_urls.description: The URLs or local absolute file paths of the reference images.

tools.name: mshtools-find_asset_bbox
tools.description: Find bounding boxes of image assets in a webpage screenshot.

input_url.description: The URL of the image to analyze, or the local absolute file path of the image.

tools.name: mshtools-crop_and_replicate_assets_in_image
tools.description: Extract image assets from given bounding boxes in webpage screenshot.

input_url.description: The URL of the image to crop and generate replicated assets.

output_folder.description: The output folder path to store the cleaned assets.

bbox.description: List of bounding boxes as '[(x1, y1, x2, y2), ...]' for assets extraction.

transparent.description: List of boolean values as '[True, False, ...]' indicating whether each asset needs transparent background.

tools.name: mshtools-get_available_voices
tools.description: Retrieve a list of available voices for speech generation.

tools.name: mshtools-generate_speech
tools.description: Convert text to speech using an existing voice ID.

text.description: The text to convert to speech.

voice_id.description: The voice ID to use for speech generation.

output_path.description: File path where the generated audio will be saved.

tools.name: mshtools-generate_sound_effects
tools.description: Create custom sound effects based on an English description and duration.

description.description: The description of sound effects, MUST be in English.

duration.description: The duration of sound effects, range (0.5, 22) seconds.

output_path.description: File path where the generated audio will be saved.

tools.name: mshtools-get_data_source_desc
tools.description: Returns detailed information and API details about the chosen data source.

tools.name: mshtools-get_data_source
tools.description: Get a response with data preview and a file from a specific data source API.

api_name.description: Name of the API to call.

tools.name: mshtools-deploy_website
tools.description: Deploy a website or application to a public production environment.

type.description: Type of website or application to deploy.

local_dir.description: Absolute path of local directory to deploy.

description.description: The description of the website or application to deploy.

tools.name: mshtools-slides_generator
tools.description: Store the HTML-formatted presentation source code in the content to the specified directory, and convert the source code into a .pptx format file.

file_path.description: The HTML source file of the presentation (must end with .pptx.html).

content.description: Content of the PPT presentation in HTML format.

append.description: Append content to the presentation instead of overwriting the file.
